Puzzle Wallet is the simplest way to access the zero-knowledge power of Aleo.

With Puzzle, you can:
🕹️ play games and earn 🧩 Points to collect rewards and enter giveaways
💅 enjoy feeless transactions with Puzzle's delegated proving
🤫 control the visibility of your onchain assets and transactions
🧪 test out your deployed Leo programs
👯 further protect your accounts and share custody with others through multi-factor authentication (soon)

👷 Please note that Aleo Mainnet is newly released. Users should expect varying network conditions while the ecosystem migrates.

Visit us at https://puzzle.online and follow us on Twitter @lets_puzzle to stay in the loop.
